text: Aur agar tum ko Allah koi takleef phonchaye to ba-juz uss kay aur koi uss ko door kerney wala nahi hai aur agar woh tum ko koi khair phonchana chahaye to uss kay fazal ka koi hataney wala nahi woh apna fazal apney bandon mein say jiss per chahaye nichawar kerdey aur woh bari maghfirat bari rehmat wala hai
